about.message: I am a dedicated professional who strives to perform tasks to the best of my ability. My strong communication skills enable me to collaborate effectively with others, and I am always eager to learn and apply new knowledge. My approach to work is defined by a blend of meticulous attention to detail and a drive to meet and exceed targets. I take pride in delivering high-quality results and embracing change as a pathway to improvement. I believe that challenging oneself is essential for personal and professional growth, and I thrive on turning challenges into opportunities. My aim is to add value to the workplace through hard work, perseverance, effective communication, and active listening.
about.name: Anushqa Tamryn Kandan

resume.description: I graduated with a bachelors certificate at Spine Road High where I was also the Head Girl in my matric year. I was part of many extra curricular activities such as Interfaith, school choir,DIY, and played certain sports such as softball, baseball and volleyball. I also represented my school in 2018 at the South African institute of international affairs that took place in Johannesburg where I gave a presentation about climate change before 5 United Nations members.
I Studied a Bachelor of Science in biodiversity and conservation biology, however due to financial issues with NSFAS I had to drop out at the beginning of my 3rd year.
I worked as an agent at Sigma for 3 months where I was constantly a Top performer. While being there I have attained valuable skills including time management and how to multi-task efficiently.
I am currently studying Software development and attaining various skills sets, such as HTML,CSS,JavaScript and bootstrap.

testimonials.message: Anushqa is a very bright and hardworking individual who is always striving to do her best. She is extremely kind and her willingness to help others is of admiration. She never ceases to amaze me with her knowledge of coding and is the most down to earth person you can have a conversation with.
testimonials.name: Nizaam Jeftha

testimonials.message: Anushqa embodies a rare blend of dedication, and adaptability that makes her an invaluable asset to any organization. Her commitment to excellence is evident in her consistent delivery of high quality work, reflecting her strong work ethic and attention to detail. Any team would be lucky to have her.
testimonials.name: Masoodah George

testimonials.message: Anushqa is a critical thinker and a diligent worker. She is a strong problem solver who thrives when working alone or in a collaborative setting. As a person she is warm, kind and jovial. She has a great sense of hunour and laughs at my jokes, even the dry ones. Anushqa would be a great asset to any organization.
testimonials.name: Caleb Okkers

testimonials.message: Anushqa is a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thrives on collaborating with her peers and excels at working on project assignments. She has acquired various skills and tools, including HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, VS Code, and wireframe. I am pleased to introduce her as an exceptional candidate and developer.
testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya(Lecturer)

testimonials.message: Anushqa is a coding virtuoso, weaving digital wonders with finesse and precision. Her coding powers transcends boundaries, shaping the digital landscape with innovation and flair. From intricate algorithms to captivating user experiences, Anushqa's expertise shines through in every line of code she writes. When it comes to coding brilliance, Anushqa stands as a beacon of inspiration for all aspiring developers
testimonials.name: Shakeel Davids

testimonials.message: One of Anushqa’s strong suits is her ability to communicate and work in a team. I’ve had the pleasure of working with her, and what I can say from our interactions is that she is a dedicated and hardworking individual.
testimonials.name: Asheeka Samuels

testimonials.message: Working with Anushqa has been a game-changer! Her coding skills is unmatched, and her dedication to quality is inspiring. Couldn't have asked for a bette
